name: MonsterCheck
0:
”Alexa, ask Monster Check to search under the bed for monsters”
”Alexa, ask Monster Check to scan the house for monsters”
”Alexa, open Monster Check”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monster check
des:
Is your child afraid of monsters? Mine, too. Monster Check is an app for parents that "scans"* for monsters and reports back that none were found. Monster Check never finds any creature, so your child can feel safe knowing there are no monsters lurking around.

* NOTE - THIS APP DOES NOT CLAIM TO ACTUALLY SCAN FOR ANYTHING NOR DOES IT HAVE ANY ABILITY TO FIND ANY CREATURE. IT IS ONLY DESIGNED TO HELP PARENTS GIVE THEIR CHILDREN PEACE OF MIND.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
